titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at S. Martins Church in the Fields At the funerall of the Lady Blount, the 6. day of December, An. Dom. 1619.
titleStmt.author: Mountford, Thomas, d. 1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Bernard Alsop for Iohn Hodgets,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 3135 on UMI microfilm reel 700.
Reproductions of the originals in the Cambridge University Library and the Bodleian Library.
Appears at reel 700 (Cambridge University Library copy) and at reel 1524 (Bodleian Library copy).
